mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def singleton_pos(arr):
    """
    Returns a list of indices of the elements that appear only once in the list.
    
    Args:
    arr (list): A list of integers.
    
    Returns:
    list: A list of indices of singleton elements.
    """
    counts = Counter(arr)
    return [i for (i, num) in enumerate(arr) if counts[num] != 1]

mutants.original_line: return [i for i, num in enumerate(arr) if counts[num] == 1]
mutants.mutated_line: return [i for (i, num) in enumerate(arr) if counts[num] == 2]

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def singleton_pos(arr):
    """
    Returns a list of indices of the elements that appear only once in the list.
    
    Args:
    arr (list): A list of integers.
    
    Returns:
    list: A list of indices of singleton elements.
    """
    counts = Counter(arr)
    return [i for (i, num) in enumerate(arr) if counts[num] == -1]
